15 hours ago - Amazon opened its tenth physical bookstore in 2017; media speculation at the time suggested that Amazon planned to eventually roll out 300 to 400 bookstores around the country. All of its locations were closed in 2022 along with other retail locations under the "Amazon 4-Star" brand.

t: Amazon Brand Registry: Protect your brand in Italy
s: Start your brand's Amazon journey by enrolling it in Amazon Brand Registry for free. After enrolling, you'll be able to unlock a suite of brand-building tools and obtain various protection benefits. You can enrol your brand even if you don't sell in an Amazon store.

t: Amazon Logo and symbol, meaning, history, PNG, brand
s: The curved orange line reminds us of a friendly smile, and the company managed to use this symbol to the maximum, making a legend out of simple lines. Amazon founder Jeff Bezos did not want to spend money on additional branding elements, such as package design.
